message: hey :-) Why the hell you guys building MBots if you have two mendels from me which could print day/night new mendels :-P kinda fail ;-)
I am going to work on my tweeting donation bot tonight
you can build any type of bot at Make-A-Bot
We're not building MBots, just open to it...

got the wrong crimp connectors, need these http://www.newark.com/jsp/search/productdetail.jsp?sku=90B6763 instead of these http://www.newark.com/tyco-electronics-amp/171639-1/contact-socket-20-16awg-crimp/dp/66F1674
Hey, what's this talk of a mini quadcopter? Is it the acrylic one that had a template online? Is this still happening tonight, or was that last night? Are notes available?
Yes, Make-A-Bot Monday is now NYC Robotics - http://www.meetup.com/NYC-Robotics/  We're also on Convore (where discussion of mini quadcopter can be found): https://convore.com/nyc-robotics

@psytek I might have those connectors.  Are they used in PC power supplies, like perhaps 4 pin molex connectors?  I used to do a lot of custom sleeving stuff.  I'll bring what I have by tonight (2 May).
I ended up splicing the wires...
Still interested in finding a bill acceptor that can take 20s
Also found out the the bill accepter only takes $1 and $5... so instead of using it for the tweeting donation bot, going to use it for the laser cutter.
What is the Make a Bot plan? How will the quadcopter sense pitch, attitude, roll, etc? Will it be counter-rotating props or regular?
So RC, not autonomous? Probably a good idea for the size. Any telemetry?
